title: Vector Parallelism Check
description: This function checks if two 3-dimensional vectors A and B are parallel by determining if the cross product between them is a zero vector.
name: V3_PAR

input.name: A
input.description: The first 3-dimensional vector to check for parallelism.

input.name: B
input.description: The second 3-dimensional vector to check for parallelism.

return_value.description: Returns TRUE if the vectors A and B are parallel, otherwise returns FALSE.
